Detailed Description

Obtains an instance of the class EditorDocument and destructs it when necessary. An editor document obtainer does a reference counting, hence when all editor document obtainers are destructed and the editor document obtainer has been initialized to obtain a disposable editor document, the editor document itself will get deleted too. If objects share one instance of the class EditorDocument, it is strongly recommended to use an editor document obtainer instead of a pointer to the editor document itself.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

EditorDocumentObtainer::EditorDocumentObtainer (   ) 
 

If the default constructor is used, the parameters have to be provided by using the method Init.

EditorDocumentObtainer::EditorDocumentObtainer (  EditorDocument *  doc,
BOOLEAN  disposeable
) 
 

Parameters:
doc Pointer to the editor document, which may be shared.
disposable If set to TRUE, the editor document doc will get deleted automatically, when no editor document obtainer references this editor document anymore.
